com.dor.coupons.system.dao

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDBDAO

    public interface CustomerDAO

    This CustomerDAO interface is for reading and writing to the Customer table in the database.

    The interfece has the following methods:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dor aharon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCustomer(Customer customer)
      Add a customer to the database.
      java.lang.Iterable<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      Get all existing customers from the database.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons()
      Get all coupons the client purchased.
      Customer getCustomer(long id)
      Get a customer object according to a given id.
      boolean login(java.lang.String customerName, java.lang.String password)
      Checks if customer exists in database by name and compares given password to the one in the database
      void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      Delete customer from the database.
      void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Update existing customer in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • createCustomer

        void createCustomer(Customer customer)
        Add a customer to the database.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer object you want to add to the database.

      • removeCustomer

        void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
        Delete customer from the database.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer object you want to delete from the database.

      • updateCustomer

        void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
        Update existing customer in the database.
        Parameters:
        customer - The updated customer object you want to replace in the database.

      • getCustomer

        Customer getCustomer(long id)
        Get a customer object according to a given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the customer you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        customer object with the given id.

      • getAllCustomers

        java.lang.Iterable<Customer> getAllCustomers()
        Get all existing customers from the database.
        Returns:
        Iterable of all the customers objects from the database.

      • getCoupons

        java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons()
        Get all coupons the client purchased.
        Returns:
        Collection of all the coupons that the customer purchase.

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String customerName,
              java.lang.String password)
        Checks if customer exists in database by name and compares given password to the one in the database
        Parameters:
        customerName - Given customer name String for login
        password - Given customer password String for login
        Returns:
        Boolean of login success
